name: ElectroPets - Early Demo
description:
Take care of cute little desktop kittens in their own little virtual alien world with food and water.

ElectroPets

A developing Tamagotchi-like, idle, relaxing, ranching game that could double as a screensaver and interactive wallpaper for unused monitors/screen space. Maybe you'll take care of your pets longer than anyone else? Maybe you'll just enjoy their fleeting company.


Try an early showcase here for free! Donations are welcome, appreciated and will support on-going development and improvement of passionate content.
